p: Another non-arthropod-borne route under investigation is the sexually driven spreading. Indeed, since the discovery of ZIKV sexual transmission, great efforts have been made to understand whether other arboviruses are able to infect the genital tract, and whether they can be passed through sexual intercourse. CHIKV RNA was detected in the seminal fluid of one patient who was co-infected with DENV3. In this patient, the semen remained positive one month from the onset of symptoms [ 203].
